title: About us
intro:
Daniel Leivers, Founder, is a regular speaker at events across Europe. Specialising in iOS development, AI, Swift, working with GraphQL and React Native applications.

Recent speaking events:
swmobile_intro: Dan is a co-organises of SWmobile in Bristol. SWmobile is mobile focused tech group based in the South West of England. The events are free, well-liked and give members an opportunity to meet and learn from other mobile professionals based in the area and beyond. Come for a beer and network!
